bug.author: sunnyzhong812
bug.description:
Describe the bug Failed to compile. To Reproduce Steps to reproduce the behavior:
I try install and start ,Ubuntu 16.04 and 20.04 is same error. See error
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40876366/94394731-9adc9d80-0190-11eb-9770-f31a21f138d4.png></denchmark-link>
Desktop (please complete the following information):
OS: Ubuntu16.04.7 / 20.04 Browser :Firefox Version node 11.15.0, npm 6.7.0

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/sunnyzhong812>@sunnyzhong812</denchmark-link> ! Could you execute inside the main dir?

Hi @sunnyzhong812 ! Could you execute npm list react-spinners inside the main make-sense dir?
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/SkalskiP>@SkalskiP</denchmark-link> , <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/40876366/94399423-e3e51f80-0199-11eb-943d-509f5dcadce0.png></denchmark-link>
Thank you

<denchmark-link:https://github.com/sunnyzhong812>@sunnyzhong812</denchmark-link> The reason that the application does not start correctly is the inappropriate version of this library. Which is very strange because should use the version defined in . Try to change the library version manually to . Try inside dir.
<denchmark-link:https://github.com/SkalskiP>@SkalskiP</denchmark-link> It's ok. Because when I installed, used "sudo npm audit fix --production --unsafe-perm=true --allow-root".
